TopicTitle: [WIP][1.3.1] North Kerbin Dynamics - Nuclear Bombs and Heavy Ordnance Pack (and other things) v0.84b

Articles.Content:
So I was screwing around with the Karl and when I had fired it just popped off my tank. I fixed this by putting this into the part's config: 

breakingForce = 400
breakingTorque = 400

Now my tank flips instead of being disarmed.

@harpwner

 Sry for asking again. the 2 zumwalt-class weapons are you gonna make them?

Edited January 23, 2016 by Noellen

Awesome mod/pack! Love it!!!

However i have one suggestion: When the bomb goes off, there is no "flash" like when a real nuclear weapons is detonated. So maybe could you add an effect that makes you blinded for a second? 

 

Like in this video of a test:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UTdy1Yp1h5A

Note how when it explodes it produces a violent blue flash. 

I would appreciate if you made this a thing!!!

15 hours ago, Alfatejp said:

Awesome mod/pack! Love it!!!

However i have one suggestion: When the bomb goes off, there is no "flash" like when a real nuclear weapons is detonated. So maybe could you add an effect that makes you blinded for a second? 

Note how when it explodes it produces a violent blue flash. 

I would appreciate if you made this a thing!!!

 

 

That flash is due to the limitations of the camera, it should be white, not blue.

 

Also, I have no idea if that's possible

6 hours ago, Thatdude253 said:

 

That flash is due to the limitations of the camera, it should be white, not blue.

 

Also, I have no idea if that's possible

Right. White flash. BIG FLASH

 

If a flash was implemented the mod would be much more realistic and the bomb would feel more powerful.

If it works or not is up to the mod developer  it was just a simple request, which means it will probably not be implemented. But i hope that he might think about implementing it though!

1 hour ago, Alfatejp said:

Right. White flash. BIG FLASH

 

If a flash was implemented the mod would be much more realistic and the bomb would feel more powerful.

If it works or not is up to the mod developer  it was just a simple request, which means it will probably not be implemented. But i hope that he might think about implementing it though!

 

 

 

 

well it's really up to the engine and the game. Sadly I haven't been able to get it work but that's not for lack of trying.
@harpwner Sry for asking again, zumwalt class weapons?

1 hour ago, Noellen said:

@harpwner Sry for asking again, zumwalt class weapons?

lol I keep forgetting to click the quote button and reply. Yeah I'll do those weapons, just don't expect them too soon as I've got school and I'm now teaching myself Guitar on top of my YouTube channel. You could say I'm too busy, I say I'm just extremely good at juggling responsibilities.
You can make the Exocet radar-homing now that BDA's updated.
ooh yeah, though again I must stress that another update may not come 'till 1.1 drops and BDArmory updates to it
When I Detonate nukes, The cloud sometimes just stays in/on the ground. Is there any way to fix this?

Maybe you could create the nuclear flash similarly to the way that SQUAD makes the skybox darken when you look at the sun, using and tweaking the glare from the sun to appear when you look at the flash. I'm not sure how that would work (not even sure if I make sense) but a suggestion anyway.
Naval rocketlauncher?

Well i have the same problem of the nukes not exploding and I've tried dropping them from REALLY high up and REALLY low to the ground and i need a video up soon but if theres no big nuke explosion then no video

I still envy your particle effects but my texturing has improved significantly as of late

My effects are improving

Not my textures... Still missing Peter

Sadly I downloaded this mod but then when i droped/fireed the  bombs I get no explosion effect just the stock crash effect. No mushroom cloud. (btw i tested all of them) They do the damage but then then its not fun without the mushroom cloud. : (

Short Form: No big nuke explosion.

Hi there. Do you have BD Armory and a weapon manger in your vessel ?

Plus try arming the craft by clicking the Trigger button. Drop the bomb at atleast 300-1000m high to ensure survival of the vessel.

Hope this helps

When I first got the mod I thought it was broken but if you have a nuke on a plane or whatever make sure you don't just jettison it because you gotta fire the "missle" then it should explode snd also make sure your altitude is acceptable
If you're doing modern naval guns, any chance of the LCS 57mm? Great small ship/corvette style ship gun. Real rapid fire too, with airburst to boot

AHEM

Hello Everyone, I have a progress report. Latin II has been tough on me due to vocab and tests, but now I'm mostly freed from such horrific responsibilities...

So I've experimented a bit

And while creating my KV-2 turret, I decided to add a bit to the texture and even give it a normal map... the result?

I think I can take the spot for sexiest turret in BDArmory right? pretty please?

 

On a sidenote, I will begin work on the naval guns. All requests thus far are accepted so this next update is basically turrets... turrets...and turrets

Edited February 6, 2016 by harpwner
This mod is slowly turning into Never Enuf Dakka. Not that that's a bad thing...
